Header: The President says that enemy invasions were defeated due to the commitment of heroic solders
Content: President Maithripala Sirisena says that enemy invasions were defeated due to the commitment of heroic solders. The President said this while attending a function at the Katukurunda Special Task Force Training School. The passing out parade of 50 Police Inspectors, 183 Police Constables and 41 women police constables who successfully completed the 76th basic training course at the Katukurunda Special Task Force Training School, took place at its premises. It was held under the patronage President Maithripala Sirisena. The President presented medals to six of them who excelled at the training course. Drill displays, band displays and parachute items added colour to the ceremony. President Maithripala Sirisena said that the parents have given their children to the nation to take leadership in eliminating drugs, crimes and illegal activities. Deputy Minister Palitha Thewarapperuma, Defence Secretary General Shantha Kottegoda, Western Province Governor A.J.M. Musammil and Acting IGP Chandana Wickremarathna were present on the occasion.
